Package com.heno.service

Class SaleAgreementService

java.lang.Object
com.heno.service.SaleAgreementService
@Service public class SaleAgreementService extends Object
Service class for managing sale agreements.

      Retrieves all AgreementToShowInListDto associated with the specified employee.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • addAgreement

      Parameters:
      saleAgreementAddDto - The DTO containing information for creating the sale agreement.
      employee - The employee associated with the sale agreement.

      employee - The employee associated with the sale agreement.
